text: Clodoaldo Lopes do Carmo (27 April 1968 in São PauloSports-Reference profile) is a retired Brazilian athlete who specialised in the 3000 metres steeplechase. He represented his country at two Olympic Games, in 1992 and 1996, making it to the final on the first occasion.
